title: Content Strategist & Community Lead
japaneseTitle: コミュニティリーダー
description: Orchestrated India's largest cloud technology conference with 20+ industry speakers and 800+ attendees. Applied 'omotenashi' hospitality principles to create memorable developer experiences.

title: Lead Campus Organizer
description: Built thriving developer community of 800+ students through tech talks, workshops, and coding competitions. Embraced 'wa' harmony principles to foster collaborative learning environment.

title: Technical Infrastructure Lead
description: Engineered technical infrastructure for West Bengal's premier offline hackathon. Applied 'monozukuri' manufacturing excellence to create seamless event technology stack.

title: Web Development Team Lead
organization: IEI Student Chapter Electrical Engineering AOT
description: Led cross-functional development team building institutional web presence. Implemented 'kaizen' continuous improvement methodology for project management and code quality.

title: Open Source Mentor
japaneseTitle: オープンソース指導者
description: Guided 50+ developers in open-source contributions across various projects. Applied 'senpai-kohai' mentorship traditions to nurture next generation of developers.
